data.title: Home
data.meta_description: We connect and protect critical controls and systems around the world.
data.text:
SIMPLIFY YOUR ENGINEERING

New Design To Manufacturing Software

The Design To Manufacturing (DTM) software lets you customize panel designs, enclosures, machines and factory systems using a single source of truth. Manufacture higher quality enclosures faster – and at a much lower cost.

Learn More

Maximize the lifecycle of electronic devices

Thermal Audit

As temperatures rise, industrial electronics can overheat, causing malfunction and even complete device failure that can ultimately lead to machine downtime. A thermal audit can identify problem areas early on before they become bigger obstacles.

Request Free Audit

To help customers maximize uptime through optimum protection, application expertise, superior quality, and global service. We protect in most demanding environments through power, enclosures, and advanced cooling.

For the fastest-growing verticals, to solve the most challenging problems. Profitable growth as we combine leading technology with the ability to scale.

Selection tools, design software, connected manufacturing and workers, and easy to operate products to boost productivity. Get involved early in the design process to accelerate growth and make hardware revenues sticky.

Choose from 12,000+ standard products with a large in-stock selection. All products are manufactured locally in multiple regions around the world, and meet or exceed certification standards, including IEC, UL, CSA, NEMA, and CE.

The nVent HOFFMAN Enclosure for Electric Vehicle ( EV) Charging Inverters is built to handle the most challenging operating conditions to protect critical EV Infrastructure systems. Durable, reliable, and proudly made in the US with US steel to meet NEVI/BABA requirements needed for government funding.

nVent today announced that it has completed the previously announced acquisition of the parent of Trachte, LLC, a leading manufacturer of custom-engineered control building solutions designed to protect critical electrical infrastructure assets.

New seismic Zone 4-rated reinforcement kits and solid plinth bases are now available off the shelf for global IEC modular enclosures.

With more than 16,000 standard products, nVent HOFFMAN has one of the most comprehensive product portfolios within the industry. Standard products include mild steel and stainless steel, wall-mounted and free-standing enclosures, consoles, non-metallic enclosures, and junction and terminal boxes, as well as cable and climate control solutions. nVent HOFFMAN also offers specific enclosure designs including outdoor enclosures, EMC, Hazardous Locations, Seismic and Hygienic Design.

The Express Customization service process is fast and accurate, and is based on customer drawings. Above all, the service is all about speed, which means delivery can be made between 5 to 10 working days, subject to product and modification center availability.​

nVent HOFFMAN offers a wide range of customization features such as machining, special dimensions, custom colors, and additional protection for harsh environments. Our highly automated factory, with state-of-the-art production equipment, is the ideal place for serial production, making customization flexible and cost-effective.
